posts.text: Excellent demonstration of how lazy "safety engineering" produces inadvertent "lobotomization" in LLMs: I'm invoking a specific formal theory the LLM is aware of, but a system prompt discouraging responses that "wrap identifiable people" interferes with the model's attempts to anchor to theory name.
